description.main_subject: Video conference displaying a data visualization slide
description.detailed_description: A screen capture displays a Microsoft Teams video conference, featuring a presentation slide on "Accuracy Ranking of Quantitative Perceptual Tasks" with a blue background and white text. The slide illustrates a hierarchy of perceptual accuracy from position to color/density, while the right panel shows participant avatars and the bottom displays a Windows taskbar. The scene conveys an educational or professional online meeting environment.
visual_elements: Perceptual tasks (Position, Length, Angle, Slope, Area, Volume, Color, Density)
